page.title: 13TATTON DALE HOME FARM
page.content: VIRTUALLY UNTOUCHED SINCE I938,THE { {HOME FARM AND ESTATE YARD}WERE RESTORED AND OPENED UP AS A TOURIST ATTRACTION IN I98I SHOWING THE ROLE OF THE FARM AND ESTATE YARD IN THE LIFE OF TATTON IN THE THIRTIES. THE{FARM}IS STOCKED WITH HORSES,PIGS, CATTLE,SHEEP AND GOATS, MANY OF THEM RARE BREEDS. FARMING OPERATIONS ARE CARRIED OUT WITH VINTAGE MACHINERY OF WHICH A LARGE COLLECTION IS GRADUALLY BEING BUILT UP. {SHIRE HORSES}ARE USED IN PREFERENCE TO TRACTORS. MUCH HAS BEEN RESTORED;BESIDES FARM BUILDINGS THERE ARE ESTATE OFFICES,CARETAKER'S COTTAGE,MILL, GRANARY,SLAUGHTERHOUSE,SMITHY, WORKSHOPS FOR WHEELWRIGHTS AND JOINERS OPEN FROM MARCH TO NOVEMBER FOR VISITORS;A GUIDE LEAFLET IS AVAILABLE.
